message.name: ERR_INVALIDATE_PARTIAL_CANCELLED
message.locale: The payment must be fully canceled to be invalidated.
The payment must be fully cancelled to be invalidated.

message.name: ERR_REGENERATE_PARTIAL_CANCELLED
message.locale: The payment must be fully canceled to be regenerated.
The payment must be fully cancelled to be regenerated.

message.name: ERR_CANCEL_REQUEST_NOT_PROCESSED
message.locale: An unprocessed cancellation request has already been sent.
